MENTAL_ADD_SCH_C_Q1.header: Zealthy mental health coaches are well trained to supplement your psychiatric care.
listItems: We can match you to a coach, who will work directly with your provider to ensure that any appropriately prescribed medication is supplemented by the right emotional support.
You will be able to hold monthly 45-minute sessions with your coach and message them between sessions in your Zealthy portal.

MENTAL_ADD_SCH_C_Q2.header: 9/10 members report that they benefitted from working with a Zealthy mental health coach.
MENTAL_ADD_SCH_C_Q2.description: At Zealthy, we know that healing really happens through compassionate and ongoing support.

listItems: Research consistently shows that behavioral interventions, such as 1:1 coaching, produce better long-term outcomes than medication alone.

For a limited time, we are offering your first month of coaching for just $49. After your first month, coaching is just $99/month, with no additional fees or co-pays. You can request another coach if itâ€™s not the right fit or opt out anytime.

MENTAL_C_INTRO.header: Select your coach & schedule your first 1:1 video session.
MENTAL_C_INTRO.description: Zealthy works hard to match you with a mental health coach who can understand and empathize with you.

MENTAL_C_Q1.subheaderBold: Help us find the right coach for you.
MENTAL_C_Q1.subheader: Please answer a few questions about yourself. Your answers will help us match you to the best Zealthy coach for you, and will also give your coach a starting point to get to know you.

MENTAL_ADD_SCH_C_Q5.header: Select your coach & schedule your first 1:1 video session.
MENTAL_ADD_SCH_C_Q5.subheader: Based on your responses, we have suggested a coach or coaches who may be a strong fit for you.
listItems: You can schedule your first session with a coach here, which you will be able to hold monthly thereafter.
They will ensure you are getting holistic care, including medication and behavioral change personalized to you.
You can message your coach at any time on the Zealthy portal.
